TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供 对象的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类将一种类型的链接转换为另一种类型, 并访问标准值和子属性。Use the class to convert links of one type to another type, and to access standard values and subordinate properties. 通过访问此类。Access this class through .
